paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Detection of both BRCA2 c.26delC mutant and wild type alleles where deoxyinosine is used at the c.-26G>A SNP.
Detection of both BRCA2 c.26delC mutant and wild type alleles where deoxyinosine is used at the c.-26G>A SNP.

functional_data.summary: The c.26delC mutation was detected using HRM assays.

variants.additional_notes: The c.26delC mutation is a known pathogenic variant.
key_quotes: Detection of both BRCA2 c.26delC mutant allele and the wild type allele where a dI in the primer has been used to mask the c.-26 G>A polymorphism.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
